Name: Yakiniku simulator
About the game: Are you hungry? Do you want some yakiniku? Let's play this game! Simple and easy! Simulate to eating a yakiniku with no more calories!!! Just chill out and simulate eating yakiniku! GAME FEATURES This game is so simple you can play with only 1 mode but can apply to several types of play. 1. Plain play Nothing to do so much.. just play for fun or chat with friends. 2. Play with rice If you hungry, you can enjoy your meal with only rice bowls. (You can add more sauce or salt for a good taste.) 3. Play with beer Enjoy the yakiniku atmosphere with cold beer. It'll make you relax. 4. Play with salad. Do you want to diet? Don't worry, this game will make your salad's taste better!!! Try it!!! 5. ETC You can enjoy our game in a lot of ways. Please share with us for your play! HOW TO PLAY 1. keep raw meat on the stove. 2. Flip meat when you think it's OK. 3. Beware it's OVERCOOK! 4. Throw away burned meat. 5. Keep perfect meat to sauce and eat it! *This game is not support any controller BUT support with rice and beer!!!! Enjoy your meal!!!!!!!
